document.full_text: for a dry and cold, dust-storm-ridden planet, mars look awfully wet in some places.  mud volcanoes spotted by an international planetary science team look like the latest.
document.title: mud volcanoes of mars revealed
lines_and_colors: for a dry and cold, dust-storm-ridden planet, mars look awfully wet in some places.  mud volcanoes spotted by an international planetary science team look like the latest.
